Plot the multitrait stability index

plot.MTSI.Rd

Plot the multitrait stability index using ggplot-generated graphics. .

# S3 method for MTSI
plot(x,  SI = 15, radar = TRUE, size.point = 2,
     col.sel = "red", col.nonsel = "black", ...)

Arguments

x

An object of class MTSI
SI

An integer [0-100]. The selection intensity in percentage of the total number of genotypes.
radar

Logical argument. If true (default) a radar plot is generated after using coord_polar().
size.point

The size of the point in graphic.
col.sel

The colour for selected genotypes.
col.nonsel

The colour for nonselected genotypes.
...

Other arguments of the function.

Examples

library(METAAB)
MTSI_MODEL = WAASB(data_ge,
                   resp = c(GY, HM),
                   gen = GEN,
                   env = ENV,
                   rep = REP)
#> Evaluating variable GY 50 % 
#> Evaluating variable HM 100 % 
#> Done!

MTSI_index = MTSI(MTSI_MODEL)
#> 
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Principal Component Analysis
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#>     Eigenvalues Variance (%) Cum. variance (%)
#> PC1   1.6566277     82.83139          82.83139
#> PC2   0.3433723     17.16861         100.00000
#> 
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Factor Analysis - factorial loadings after rotation-
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#>          FA1 Communality Uniquenesses
#> GY 0.9101175   0.8283139    0.1716861
#> HM 0.9101175   0.8283139    0.1716861
#> 
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Comunalit Mean: 0.8283139 
#> 
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Multitrait stability index
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#>     G3     G1     G6     G8     G4     G2     G9     G5     G7    G10 
#> 0.0000 0.2303 0.4846 1.0066 1.2954 1.6022 1.8318 1.8374 1.8450 3.4178 
#> 
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Selection differential for WAASB index
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#>    Factor        Xo        Xs         SD    SDperc
#> GY    FA1 0.2504736 0.1165028 -0.1339708 -53.48700
#> HM    FA1 0.6141648 0.3732404 -0.2409244 -39.22798
#> 
#> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Mean of selection differential
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#>          Xo          Xs          SD      SDperc 
#>   0.4323192   0.2448716  -0.1874476 -46.3574864 
#> 
#> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Selected genotypes
#> G3 G1
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
plot(MTSI_index)
